mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD SET USER_ID = #{userId}, LOCATION_NAME = #{locationName}, LOCATION_ID = #{locationId}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, PRICE = #{price}, CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, STATUS = #{status}, REG_DATE = #{regDate}, MOD_DATE = #{modDate}, BOARD_DATE = #{boardDate}, IS_PRICE_SUGGEST = #{isPriceSuggest}, IS_PULL = #{isPull}, LATITUDE = #{latitude}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%${title}%'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE '%${title}%' AND CONTENT LIKE '%${content}%'

SELECT BOARD.ID, BOARD.USER_ID, USER.NICKNAME, BOARD.TITLE, BOARD.CONTENT, BOARD.LOCATION_NAME, BOARD.PRICE, BOARD.CATEGORY_ID, BOARD.STATUS, BOARD.BOARD_DATE, BOARD.IS_PRICE_SUGGEST, BOARD.IS_PULL FROM BOARD, USER WHERE BOARD.USER_ID = USER.ID AND BOARD.ID = #{id}
